title: Paper accepted at HASP 2025
description: Our paper on Real-Time Bit-Flip Protection for Deep Neural Networks on GPUs has been accepted at [HASP 2025](https://hasp2025.org/), co-located with [MICRO 2025](https://www.microarch.org/micro58/).

title: Paper accepted at SPICE 2025
description: Our paper on Position-Adaptive Temporal Sparsity for KV Caches in Long-Context LLMs has been accepted at [SPICE 2025](https://spice.cs.umd.edu/), co-located with [MICRO 2025](https://www.microarch.org/micro58/).
